title: The Krautwurst  archive - Fitna + 36 full lenght counter-jihad d
description:
"Following threats to our staff of a very serious nature, and some ill informed reports from certain corners of the British media that could directly lead to the harm of some of our staff, Liveleak.com has been left with no other choice but to remove Fitna from our servers.

This is a sad day for freedom of speech on the net but we have to place the safety and well being of our staff above all else. We would like to thank the thousands of people, from all backgrounds and religions, who gave us their support. They realised LiveLeak.com is a vehicle for many opinions and not just for the support of one.

Perhaps there is still hope that this situation may produce a discussion that could benefit and educate all of us as to how we can accept one anothers culture.

We stood for what we believe in, the ability to be heard, but in the end the price was too high." 

29/03/2008 Liveleak.com

- Guess this is where the power of P2P is going to show its worth! 
Please help distribute this collection of high-quality counter-jihad documentaries which are all to some extend being ignored, banned or condemned by broadcasters in europe and abroad. The people who made theme risk their lives in order to raise political concern on matters the believe to be of utmost importance, and some of theme have already paid the highest price.
